E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 6/11/1978
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Jim Wynn



Date: Friday, 6/13/1978
Subject: Mickey Lolich healing process
Mickey Lolich is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
